amendment.description: Amendment defines "estuary" under the Clean Water Act to include Great Lakes waters and wetlands that are similar to traditional estuaries covered by the National Estuary Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-463 to define "estuary" under the Clean Water Act to include Great Lakes waters and wetlands that are similar to traditional estuaries covered by the National Estuary Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schauer amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
